document.title: The Degand 2.2 subcorpus
document.intro: The Degand 2.2 subcorpus was compiled for a study of the causal connectives 'aangezien', 'want' and 'omdat' in Dutch news. It consists of 143 cases from a Dutch newspaper (NRC Handelsblad from 1994). The DiscAn corpus is a collection of subcorpora of Dutch language that have been annota... The Degand 2.2 subcorpus was compiled for a study of the causal connectives 'aangezien', 'want' and 'omdat' in Dutch news. It consists of 143 cases from a Dutch newspaper (NRC Handelsblad from 1994).
